roleset.name: fill in holes

example.name: passive, arg1 and arg2
example.text: Beyond that misty gray of the rain , he saw the stretching hutment, lowdiminutive log cabins , chinked with mud , with doorways [0]aman would have [*-2] to crouch [*] to get through [*T*] , with roofs of tenting laid[*] over boughs or boards from hardtack boxes , or fence rails , with crankychimneys of sticks and dried mud .

roleset.note: CHINK-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from chink.01-v)
